title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin addresses the ongoing tension between LeBron James and Lakers ownership and why LeBron might end up losing this showdown. He discusses the current relationship between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers front office and if they are committed to each other long term. He also takes a look at the rumors surrounding one super star quarterback potentially getting traded and why he's not buying it right now. Plus, Eagles OL Lane Johnson joins the show to talk about the growth of QB Jalen Hurts and Lincoln Riley leaving his alma mater Oklahoma for USC. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
